history.customerFocus: Putting Customers At The Center Of Everything
history.establishment: Established in 2018, The20 has become one of the fastest growing cosmetics retail businesses in Vietnam.
history.milestones: With more than 1 million products sold, high quality and professional service, we are proud to be a trusted companion of every customer.

desc.0: Emerge and rapidly grow: Born and developed rapidly, thanks to the right vision and a young, enthusiastic team, the company quickly established its position in the Vietnamese market.
desc.1: Focusing on the domestic market: The first products were launched and warmly received by Vietnamese consumers.

desc.0: Expanding into international markets: The company began exporting products to countries in the region and around the world, opening up new development opportunities.
desc.1: Diversifying product lines: Developing skincare and hair care product lines to meet the diverse needs of customers, the company constantly researches and launches new, high-quality products.

desc.0: Revolutionizing sales with livestreaming: Resounding success with livestream sales sessions achieved huge revenue, affirming the brand's appeal. Trusted and recommended by many famous beauty bloggers and KOLs such as Ngoc Trinh, Chanh Beauty, Hannaholala,...
desc.1: Capturing a significant market share: With more than 100,000 products sold each month, the company has accounted for 28.5% of the total revenue of the Vietnamese cosmetics industry, becoming one of the leading cosmetic brands.

2.title: Cosmetics, Health Care and Beauty Purchasing Specialist
2.details:
• Find suppliers with competitive prices and reasonable policies. Negotiate with suppliers on pricing, payment terms, and appropriate discounts for each product line.
  • Confirm delivery schedules & monitor the supplier’s shipping process, handling complaints if there are any discrepancies with the goods.
  • Monitor payments, maintain good relationships with partners.
  • Collect, analyze, and summarize data to develop procurement plans and control information.
  • Receive and assess product quality, handle situations where goods don’t match samples, fail to comply with contracts, are damaged, or incorrect in quantity according to company policy.
  • Update the Director and related departments on timely changes in product prices and new products.
  • Manage all purchasing records, prepare periodic purchasing reports or upon request from superiors.
2.requirements:
• Fluent in Chinese.
  • English: Good communication and technical skills.
  • 1-3 years of purchasing experience (in skincare, beauty, cosmetics, health care, or retail companies).
  • Knowledge of FIFO, forecasting, and ability to source trading and raw materials in the cosmetics industry.
  • QC skills to ensure product quality according to industry standards.
  • Experience working in the Chinese or Global market with partner data in those regions.
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills, with the ability to negotiate and manage contracts.
  • Detail-oriented and meticulous.
2.benefits:
• Salary: 12,000,000 VND - 15,000,000 VND + Bonus.
  • Meals provided at the company.
  • Regular salary reviews.
  • Work in a friendly, youthful, and dynamic environment.
  • Full benefits according to government regulations.
  • Leave policies (weekly, monthly).

3.title: QC/QA Engineer (Tester)
3.details:
• Support in developing test tools: Participate in the development and improvement of testing tools to enhance testing efficiency.
  • Bug testing and fixing: Conduct product tests, identify, and fix bugs (if any). Work closely with the coding team to handle issues on a daily basis.
  • Minimize errors: Actively work to reduce the number of errors as much as possible, ensuring product quality.
  • Daily testing process: Every day, test and fix the required features, then monitor product usage. If any bugs are detected, immediately report them to the coding team for quick resolution.
  • End-of-day reporting: Summarize all errors from the day, including solutions, and report them to the manager.
3.requirements:
• Proficient in Google Sheets and Excel.
  • At least 1 year of experience as a tester.
3.benefits:
• Salary: 8,000,000 VND - 10,000,000 VND.
  • Meals provided at the company.
  • Regular salary reviews.
  • Work in a friendly, youthful, and dynamic environment.
  • Full benefits according to government regulations.
  • Leave policies (weekly, monthly).

4.title: Trademark Protection Legal Officer
4.details:
• Monitor and oversee the company’s trademark usage on online and offline platforms.
  • Identify and collect information on cases of trademark infringement, unauthorized use of logos, brand names, or related images.
  • Collaborate with the legal department to take action, including sending warning letters, requesting the removal of infringing content, or initiating legal procedures if necessary.
  • Work with stakeholders (lawyers, government agencies, external partners) to resolve issues related to trademark violations.
4.requirements:
• Proficient in English.
  • Basic knowledge of intellectual property (trademarks).
  • Careful, quick, and highly self-disciplined.
4.benefits:
• Salary: 8,000,000 VND - 10,000,000 VND.
  • Meals provided at the company.
  • Regular salary reviews.
  • Work in a friendly, youthful, and dynamic environment.
  • Full benefits according to government regulations.
  • Leave policies (weekly, monthly).
